dc_description_s: This is the information about the number and location of tags (parking tickets) during this snow emergency. Tag data will be retained for all Snow Emergencies in each snow season, until there is five full seasons of snow emergencies. Disclaimer: At this point we only have the tag data enclosed for day 2 and day 3 the snow emergencies. Day 1 tag data is collected manually and is not available at this time electronically.There is also an expected address error rate of between 5 and 10 percent.Snow Emergency Tags  2018/2019 Season #3 Westminster (2/12/19 thru 2/14/19)      Field Name     Field Type     Field Description       FID     Object ID     Object ID       Citation_N     Text254     Citation Number       Address     Text 254     Address of the citation       Latitude     Numeric     X Coordinate - Geocode       Longitude     Numeric     Y Coordinate -  Geocode       Neighborho     Text 254     Neighborhood Location       Community     Text 254     Community Location       Ward     Text 254     Ward Location       Day_ID     Numeric     Snow Emergency Day Identifier       Date     Date     Citation Date       Code     Text 254     Snow Emergency  Parking Ordinance       Descriptio     Text 2     Snow Emergency  Parking Ordinance Description       Tow_Dist     Double 15     Tow Districts  Identifier
dc_title_s: Snow Emergency Westminster Tags: City of Minneapolis, Minnesota, 2019
